Class Staff

java.lang.Object
assignment.support.Person
assignment.core.Staff
All Implemented Interfaces:
Employee, java.io.Serializable

public class Staff
extends Person
implements Employee, java.io.Serializable
maintains information about staff working at the restaurant.
